ModMetaData.name: More Hunter Drones
ModMetaData.author: AS1AW
ModMetaData.description: Adds 5 new types of hunter drones to the game: incendiary, toxic, EMP, antigrain, and smoke. Also makes the wasp trap buildable by the player. Each drone can be used both as a threat and a tool. Includes rechargeable thrower backpacks for all drone types. Fully translated into English and Russian.
